overview: Wouter Deelman is CEO and founder of Qelp, and is responsible for the vision and overall direction of the company including management, execution of the company strategy, external relations and investor relations. He has over 20 years of experience in telecommunications and high tech, including business management covering most European countries, USA and Japan for different companies including AT&T, Sony and DDV/Logica Consulting. Prior to founding Qelp, Wouter was founder and CEO of ThreeFive Photonics, a venture-backed startup company supplying optical chips to network systems vendors. Time Magazine chose ThreeFive as one of Europeâ€™s 50 most promising technology companies in 2002, and in 2003, the company was acquired by US-based ASIP (now CyOptics) and Wouter served as an executive member on the Board of Directors until founding Qelp in 2005.
